titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the publique fast the ninth of Feb. in St Maries Oxford, before the great assembly of the members of the Honourable House of Commons there assembled: and published by their speciall command.
titleStmt.author: Leslie, Henry, 1580-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Attributed on A1v to the Bishop of Down, i.e. Henry Leslie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
